div.p:
Curia ballivorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxijo die Decembris anno Dominj et cetera
lxxvijo /

quo die sponse Willelmi malisson et Dauid howison amerciantur per concessiones proprias pro
propinacione lagene seruisie pro xij d' contra statuta burgi et cetera

Eodem die Johannes lambynton' carnifex conuictus fuit per assisam pro Rebellione contra communitatem
et officiarios burgi / et de deforciacione philippi de Dunbrek sergeandi suum officium ministrantis
pro qua adiudicatur in amerciamento

Andreas lammynton' amerciatur pro perturbacione Johannis huchonson in verbo et pro vendicione carnium non
appreciatarum prout compertum fuit per assisam

Thomas gray et Johannes huchonson carnifices cum suis complicibus posuerunt se in voluntate
ballivorum pro vendicione carnium non appreciatarum et de aliis punctis pro quibus accusati
fuerunt

Item the same dai the assise has referrit the borgh strekit be thomas symson on
Dauid crukschank of iij li' vij s' for certan lede and malt til thomas fif Dauid
menyes Johne Wormot and Johne the Waus arbitrouris chosin of before anent
the lave of the lede and malt / And the saidis parties ar oblist thar handis wp
haldin in presence of the court til vndirly and fulfil the deliuerens of the fornemit persons

Item the said dai the assise has deliuerit and ordanit that William giffard sal haf
ane half nettis fisching of the fuyrdis of gilbert morison for thre yeris
tocum for twa barellis of salmond yerlie for the quhilkis ij barrelis tobe pait
til the said gilbert the said Wilyam sal fynd him souertie / the said gilbert
freand the said William yerly of a merk of the mail of the toune for the sadis
termis

the sam dai It was fundin and deliuerit be the assise that Dauid crukschank as
borgh for patrik crukschank has pait and content til Duncan sanchar of murcroft
ane barrel of salmond for the quhilk he com borgh til him et cetera

Curia capitalis burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xijo
die mensis Januarij anno Domini mo iiijco lxxvijo / quo die secte vocate et curia
affirmata absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

Eodem die thomas de culan secundo die vocatus ad instanciam Katerine de vchtirlowny
et Henrici lichton' procuratoris sui pro detencione ix bollarum brasij ut patet in processu primi
diei Non comparuit Ideo precipitur philippo de Dunbrek seriando capere districtum
ab eodem et premunire ipsum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam tercium diem processus testibus
Johanne Deif et Johanne scot scissoribus

The same dai William giffard has fundin Johne chapman eldar and Johne
chapman yungast souertie and borowis til gilbert morison for the payment
of twa barellis of salmond yerly tobe pait betuix this and lammes for
ane half nettis fisching of the furdis eftir the tenour of the act made tharupon

Item eodem die Walterus norison deuenit plegius pro Johanne skynnar pro vna barel
la salmonum mensure hamburgie ad satisfaciendum seu satisfieri faciendum alexandrum
alanson de dicta barella salmonum ad festum sancti Johannis baptiste dictum mydsummir
proximo futuro

The same dai the balyeis has assignit til Johne the Waus friday
cum viij dais til answer . til gilbert morison wpon a typpat of
vellus' price xxx s' / ij eln' and demi of fustian price vij s' vj d' and iiij s'
for romany skynnis

Thomas iamyson conuictus per assisam amerciatur pro perturbacione Willelmi hil et emendabit
eidem prout Jura volunt

the sam dai the assise has fundin and deliuerit Sym of gardin and Dauid
gethan dettouris til Androw Wenton' of his clame of his yrne et cetera
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xvj die Januarij anno et cetera lxxvijo /

quo die vxo
res Johannis stokar et Johannis cathnes ac cristiana hukstar' amerciantur pro vendicione
ceruisie xij d' contra communem ordinacionem burgj Item vxor murdaci glenmalin amerciatur similiter ut supra

Willelmus quelp plegius legalis pro Willelmo rate de indempnitate Willelmi yong choriste
aliter quam Jura volunt Similiter Dauid mar plegius pro Willelmo young ut supra

Alicia byrs / agnes Waus et cristiana hukstar' convicte per assisam ipsarum
quelibet in amerciamento pro empcione bonorum antequam deseruiatur burgenses ville

Eodem die Willelmus de Kyntor primo die vocatus per philippum de Dunbrek
sergeandum ad respondendum plegio per Willelmum more super eundem porrecto pro iniusta de
tencione vnius barelle salmonum ab eodem Willelmo ad bonum compotum Non comparuit
Ideo precipitur seriando capere districtum ab ipso et premunire eundem ad proximam curiam
legalem tanquam secundum diem processus

Nicholaus baxtar ex parte vxoris sue et Elena galt amerciantur pro propinacione
ceruisie xij d' prout compertum fuit per assisam

Item eodem die andreas culan coram ballivis in Judicio deuenit debitor thome mar
pro Johanne henrison in essyntully de xxxvj s' soluend' eidem thome infra
quindenam post festum penticostes proximo futuro

The xx dai of Januar' the yere forsaid / gilbert morison was made quyte be
ane assise of five pundis the quhilkis Dauid galichtlie sayd the said gilbert
had tane of double payment for certane merchandis' anent my lord of mar / the
quhilk assise fand and deliuerit / that the said gilbert had tane na mare pay
ment than he had gevin merchandice for et cetera

In curia ballivorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio xxiiij die Januarij anno
Domini et cetera lxxvijo / Willelmus sprunt accusatus per ballivos de inobediencia et
perturbacione philippi de Dunbrek sergeandi in ministracione sui officij / quitus
factus fuit per assisam desuper electam Et quod dictus seriandus plus egit contra
ipsum Willelmum quam pertinebat sibi ex officio suo et cetera

Curia legalis burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xxvjto die
Januarij anno predicto quo die secte vocate et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

The same dai comperit before the balyeis in plane court gilbert riburn and
James kemp producit in witnes be Dauid howison anent the prising of ane
ryng of a gold quhilk wes layd in wed to the said Dauid for xl s'
and deliuerit til philp of Dunbrek seriand til present it in the merket foure
merket dais for the prising of it / the quhilkis forsaidis witnez the gret aith
sworne said and deponit / that thai war present quhen the said seriande
present the said ryng in the merket to pryse four merket dais / And that
thai prysit it be thare athis til fifty and twa s' and vj d'

Eodem die thomas de culan tercio die vocatus ad sectam Katerine de vchtir
lowny et henrici lichton' procuratoris sui pro iniusta detencione ix bollarum brasij pro
firma vnius crofti Non comparuit Ideo precipitur sergeando capere districtum ab
eodem et cetera et premunire ipsum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam quartum et peremptorem
diem huius processus

Item eodem die Andreas goldsmyth primo die vocatus responsurus plegio per Johannem
de Dunde super eundem extenso in manibus philippi de Dunbrek sergeandi pro
iniusta detencione certorum bonorum ab eodem et pro iniusta expulsione ipsius
Johannis de domo eiusdem andree quam ut asserit habuit de ipso andree ad firmam
ante exitum termini assedacionis Non comparuit / quare datur seriando in mandato quod capiat
districtum et cetera et quod premuniat ipsum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam secundum diem processus

add.foreign: penes assedacionem aquarum et terrarum et cetera

div.p:
The same dai Alexander of chavmer aldirman / Alexander menyes Johne of mar' Dauid colison
Johne Wode Robert of cullan thomas of chavmer Dauid symson James cummyng
Alexander rede gilbert the Waus Johne the Waus' gilbert of chavmer patrik
badenagh androw branch William blindsel yungar thomas prat Alexander mar thomas
of mar William of Kyntor ser Robert leis Dauid marr Dauid Kyntor androw
Kymdy William blindsel eldar Dauid mathoson and gilbert morisone / the quhilkis
aldirman and consale avisitly / for the Reparatioune and biging of the qveyr and for
vthir causis sene proffitable for the toune / has grauntit and consentit to set the
watteris and fischingis of this burgh / and to prolong the termys tharof togiddir
with the landis pertening til the said burgh / and tochese certane personis
conuenient for the setting of the said fischingis and landis / wpon the quhilk the
aldirman gerd warne the hail communite tocomper in the tolbuthe on the morne And
schew and declarit to thame / quhat he and the consale before expremit thocht expedient
and proffitable for the reparacione and biging of the queyr as is before said The
quhilk communite weil gaderit with hail consent / na man discrepand nor
ganestandand / concludit ratefijt and affermyt toset the watteris and landis and
to prolong thare termys togiddir with al vthir reuenowis pertening to the communite
of the burgh of Abirdene / for sik termys as suld be sene to thame expedient
that salbe chosin and sworne thareto / todo for the common proffite of the toune et cetera

Die vjta februarij anno Domini et cetera lxxvijo Johannes Waus constituit gilbertum vaus'
suum fratrem germanum et Dauid marr' coniunctim et divisim suos procuratores in omnibus et singulis
causis placitis et querelis ipsum tangens seu tangere valens per quoscumque Et
promisit de Rato cum ceteris procuratorij clausulis necessariis et cetera

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem ixo die februarij anno
Domini et cetera lxxvijo

Quo die secte vocate et curia affirmata comparens coram preposito et ballivis Adam androson
burgensis huius burgi tutor Willelmi andree filij et heredis quondam Jacobi andree fratris
quondam ipsius Ade / presentauit eundem Willelmum ad elegendum sibi curatum eo quod preterit
etatem tutorie veluti probatum fuit per Juramenta thome prat Roberti prat et Elene harper quod
excessit etatem xv annorum / qui quidem Willelmus andree in presencia prepositi et ballivorum protribunali sedencium
non chaoctus sed ex proprio motu nemine cogente elegit prefatum Adam suum auunculum sibi in curatum
ad gubernandum terras et possessiones suas ac bona sua in omnibus secundum consuetudinem burgorum atque leges

Johannes Waus seriendus obligavit se coram preposito et ballivis ad satisfaciendum Jacobo cumming vni ballivorum
v s' sibi per eundem debitos inter hinc et pascha proxima

the same dai It was deliuerit be ane assise that gif Johne the Waus seriand wald
swere / that he becom nocht dettour with his son' til gilbert of chavmer for a barel of sal
mond he suld be quite / and failyeand tharof tobe dettour of the said barrel of salmond tobe pait
within lachful tym

Item the said dai thomas of culan was made quite be the assise of the wrangwis'
withhalding of ix bollis of malt fra Katerine of vchtirlowny the spous' vmquhile
of Alexander Kintor for the mail of a croft of this year' bigane / and fra thyne furth
it is deliuerit that he is na tenend to the said Katerine

William of Kintor promittit before the ballies tofree Dauid colison and David Kintor
within xv dais anent Johne Wormot of the borowgang of a ryng

Item eodem die alexander alanson primo die vocatus ad sectam Jacobi Kennarty responsurus plegio super
eundem in manibus Alexandri chavmer seriendi per dictum Jacobum extenso pro iniusta detencione xij s'
Non comparuit Ideo precipitur seriando capere districtum et cetera et premunire ipsum ad proximam curiam
legalem tanquam secundum diem processus
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xo die februarij anno Domini et cetera lxxvijo /

quo die gilbertus de
camera deuenit plegius legalis pro magistro georgio striueline quod Dauid galichtlie
erit indempnis de eo aliter quam Jura volunt Similiter dictus Dauid inuenit Willelmum blindsel
iuniorem plegium pro eo de indempnitate dicti magistri georgij ut supra

Eodem die magister georgius striueline inuenit Johannem de Knollis plegium pro eo / quod proba
bit hodie ad quindenam coram preposito et ballivis / quod actio debatabilis inter ipsum magistrum
georgium et Dauid galichtly penes certum bladum / dependet coram alio Judice / Et defi
cien' dicta probacione / Idem magister georgius obligavit se per extensionem manus sue ad releuandum
dictum Johannem suum plegium in omnibus dictam actionem concernentibus et plegium inde porrectum

Item quia Dauid galightly timebat se summoniri per litteras dominj regis adipistendas per magistrum
georgium striueline Idem Dauid per Willelmum blindsel iuniorem suum prolocutorem obtulit se coram preposito
et ballivis in presencia eiusdem magistri georgij responsurus et Juri periturus in omnibus causis et querelis
quas dictus magister georgius habuit obicere contra eum coram eisdem preposito et ballivis suis Ju
dicibus ordinariis et cetera

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xjo die februarij anno predicto / Jacobus cuming vnus ballivorum
assignauit Alexandro balcromby hodie ad xvnam ad probandum quod exoneratus est de plegia
gio dominj de petmethen de ix firlotis et dimidio frumenti penes Willelmum clerk pisto
rem / tanquam peremptorie / et hoc probato quitus est / et deficien' probacione / quod erit plegius ad
satisfaciendum seu satisfieri faciendum dictum frumentum prout Jura volunt Et dictus Willelmus
clerk constituit gilbertum Waus suum procuratorem ad videndum et audiendum dictam probacionem
et In omnibus dictam causam concernentibus promittendo de Rato et cetera

Eodem die comparuit coram Jacobo cumming vno ballivorum in Judicio magister georgius striuelin
et exposuit quod paratus fuit hodie et pridie hora legittima ad respondendum Andree sche
rar' deputato vicecomitis de Abirdene et Dauid galichtlie penes actiones debatabiles
inter ipsum magistrum et dictum Dauid penes certum bladum secundum quod ipse magister georgius
promisit eidem vicecomitis deputato ut asserit et cetera

In the balye court haldin in the tolbuthe of Abirdene the xiij dai of februar' the
yer' of god et cetera lxxvij yeris / Johne litstar in the greyn be the sycht of the aldir
man and balyeis ressauit a peis' of greyn clath contenand iij eln' and demi fra Wil ber
tilmo webstar quhilk was analit fra the said Johne and pait v s' to the man that
aght it for the quhite / eftir as it was prisit
Eodem die Willelmus robertson conuictus per assisam amerciatur pro perturbacione curie et cetera

Alanus smyth et Ricardus henrison ipsorum quilibet in amerciamento pro perturbacione adinuicem et emenda
bit alter alteri prout Jura volunt

Item the same dai it wes decretit be ane assise that thomas malisson suld pay til
Wat of auchneif xx li' of maddir for the quhilk Richard of hil is becumin souer
te to pay demi merke within laghful tyme

The xvj dai of februar' the yer' et cetera lxxvij yeris in the balye court / it was deli
uerit be ane assise anent the debate of marrowschip of fisching on the wattir / that ilke
half net and demi net / third part and third part / and quartar til quartar sal marrow togiddir

Item of xviij s' of fraght that mawnus Wormot clamyt James of Kyntor / the
said James is quite throu his purgacion made be the ordinance of the assise

Item anent the fracht clamit be James of Kyntor of mawnus Wormot for his
keyl / the said mawnus is ordanit tocum on friday and his barnys and depone how
many fraghtis he gat / quhilkis salbe modifiit be ij personis of the leist fracht
and nocht of the maist and pait til the said James

Wilyam quelp in amerciament be his awne grant for the wrangus streking of Nicol
baxtaris wif / and scho wes convict be ane assise for strublans of the said Wilyam
in word et cetera

Rob Dowgal and Johne Walkar ilkane in amerciament for strublans of vthir as wes
fundin be the assise / quhilk deliuerit that be the said Johneis awne grant he was
feit man til the said Robert quhil Witsundai for viij d' ilke ouke that he wrocht
for him self and his schere and failyeand that he mycht nocht wyrk / the said robert
suld haf his schere for ij d' in the oulk et cetera

The same dai anent certan sowmys clamyt be gilbert of chavmer agane Johne
androson his gude fadir in law / quhilk was summittit til certane persons / and to
stand finaly to the determinacione of thaim of the quhilkis the names eftir folowis
that is tosay Johne of Knollis Dauid symson thomas prat William blindsel yung
ar Dauid Kyntor Adam androson and patrik badenagh / quhilkis personis sworne
has deliuerit and ordanit / that gilbert of chawmyr anent al clamys clamit be
him of his gude fadir Johne androson sal on friday next tocum bring with him
laghful and sufficient preif / that sic sowmes as he clamis ar awand til him
And failyeand of his prefe Johne androson his gude fadir in alsfer as he
denyis sal quyte him the gret aith sworne / that he is nocht awand til him the
sowme that he clamys Alswa anent the hidis clamyt be the said gilbert
gif gilbert and his wif wil depone be thare athis on friday next tocum
that thai ar vnpait of al or of part / Johne androson sal content and pay thame in
alsfer as thai mak gude faith tharfor And this tobe endit on fridai next tocum

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xxo die februarij
anno Domini et cetera lxxvijo /

quo die Jacobus hervy reperiebatur per assisam debitor domino
thome hervy fratre suo de duabus marcis restantibus non solutis de octo marcis / pro quibus
duabus marcis Alexander hay deuenit plegius ad soluendum eidem domino thome vnam marcam ad festum
pentecostes proximo futuro et aliam marcam ad festum beati martini proximo inde sequente

Eodem die coram preposito et ballivis Jacobus hervy constituit Alexandrum hay suum procuratorem
ad prosequendum et recuperandum vnam crateram impigneratam thome litstar ipsi Jacobo ut asserit
pertinen' necnon ad agendum et defendendum pro eo in dicta causa et in omnibus aliis prout Jura volunt
Et promisit de Rato et cetera

Item the samyn dai comperit before the aldirman and balyeis in Jugement Johne androson
and offerit him tofulfil the deliuerence and ordinance of certane personis summissouris
chosin betuix him and gilbert of chawmer anent certane sowmys clamyt be the said
gilbert agane him / eftir the tenour of the act of the decrete and deliuerence of
the saidis summissouris made tharupon et cetera

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xxiijo die februarij
anno Dominj et cetera lxxvijo

The same dai at the ordinance of the aldirman and consel thomas litstar' deliuerit til
Alexander the hay procuratour' for James hervy a peis' weyand v vncis for xliij
s' vij d' deliuerit til him be the said alexander for the quhilk some' it lay in wed to
the said thomas / And gilbert morison is becumin borgh to kepe the said thomas litstar'
scaithles anent the ayris of quhilum William voket of the said peis'

Item the said day / the aldirman and balyeis be the ward of the court has assignit til
Johne Wormot Wednisday next tocum the xxv dai of this instant moneth in the hour
of caus' til answer' to the borgh strekit be Mawnus Wormot as a sey farand
man In the hand of Dauid Duncan seriand for the wrangus' halding of xx crownys
with the mare fra the said mawnus be the said John togude compt' and rekning for
fraght and costis that the said Johne suld hafe pait for his thrid part of the
schip

Paule schipman producit for witnes be mawnus Wormot / sworn deponit / that thare
wes a schip callit Nicolace of the quhilk the said mawnis was maistir vndir
god and acht the third part of his / And sais that thar wes xviijxx quartaris of malt in
hir / And that he herd the said mawnys say / that he is vncontent of his part of
the fraght tharof / bot he knawis nocht / quhethir he be pait or nocht

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xxvto die februarij anno predicto / Johannes de bughan scis
sor fatebatur se debere Nicolaio baxtar vj s' sibi adiudicat' per certos arbitros
et iniungitur ei per ballivos ad satisfaciendum dictam summam infra quindenam futuram

Eodem die Alexander balcromby adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta detencione ix firlotarum et dimidii
frumenti a Willelmo clerk pistore / quia defecit in probacione quam manucepit facere isto
die tanquam peremptorie secundum tenorem act' desuper prius fact' et satisfaciet eidem Willelmo de
dicto debito prout Jura volunt

Item eodem die actio plegij inter magnum Wormot et Johannem Wormot respectuatur cum consensu parcium
vsque diem veneris ad octo dies videlicet vijm diem marcij proximi in forma et effectu quibus stetit
isto die et cetera
